Name: Name
The instructions are about publishing re: The instructions are about publishing reports related to the scientific conference with international participation "20 years of Bulgaria in NATO and NATO in Bulgaria."
Each participant can participate with up: Each participant can participate with up to two reports at the Scientific Conference – as an author or as a co-author.
Reports are prepared in Word format, and: Reports are prepared in Word format, and each report should be no less than 6 pages and no more than 12 pages, with a recommended length of 20,000 characters including spaces.
Reports will not be accepted after this: Reports will not be accepted after this date.
These guidelines have been developed in: These guidelines have been developed in accordance with the current BDS standard ISO 690:2021 (Guide to bibliographic references and citation of information sources).
The final program of the conference will: The final program of the conference will be provided to the participants upon their registration.
Reports are sent using the attached part: Reports are sent using the attached participation form. Papers that do not follow the submission instructions will not be accepted.
